Package com.ntu.scse

Class BillMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ntu.scse.BillMgr

  • public class BillMgr
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a hotel Bill Manager that contains a list of all bills as well as methods for manipulating those bills. One BillManager can contain many Bills.
    Since:
    19/04/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Cai LingZhi, Liu Fangbing, Christopher Lim, Eliza Wong

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BillMgr​(java.util.ArrayList<Bill> billList)
      Creates a Bill Manager based on loaded data from a file.

    • Method Summary

      Tries to create a new Bill with the given reservation details and room details.
      boolean addOrderToBill​(int billNo, Order order)
      Tries to add a given order to a specified bill

      Gets the bill number from a given room number

      Prints out the finalized bill including all room service orders Sets bill status to "Paid"

    • Constructor Detail

      • BillMgr

        public BillMgr​(java.util.ArrayList<Bill> billList)
        Creates a Bill Manager based on loaded data from a file. If no previous data was present, initialize an empty master list.
        Parameters:
        billList - The list received from Main. If there was previous data, use this, else, create an empty list.

    • Method Detail

      • addBill

        public Bill addBill​(int resvNo,
                    int roomDays,
                    java.lang.String roomType,
                    java.lang.String roomNo,
                    double roomRate,
                    double discount)
        Tries to create a new Bill with the given reservation details and room details. Gets a new unique identifier automatically
        Parameters:
        resvNo - The Reservation number associated with this bill.
        roomDays - The number of nights of stay.
        roomType - The room type associated with this bill.
        roomNo - The room number associated with this bill.
        roomRate - The room price per night associated with this bill.
        discount - The discount associated with this bill.
        Returns:
        returns the newly created Bill

      • addOrderToBill

        public boolean addOrderToBill​(int billNo,
                              Order order)
        Tries to add a given order to a specified bill
        Parameters:
        billNo - The unique bill identifier
        order - order to add into the bill
        Returns:
        returns true if succeed in adding order, else return false.

      • removeOrderFromBill

        public boolean removeOrderFromBill​(int billNo,
                                   int orderNo)
        Tries to remove a given order from a specified bill
        Parameters:
        billNo - The unique bill identifier
        orderNo - order number to remove from the bill
        Returns:
        returns true if succeed in removing order, else return false.

      • printBill

        public void printBill​(int resvNo,
                      int paymentMethod)
        Prints out the finalized bill including all room service orders Sets bill status to "Paid"
        Parameters:
        resvNo - The unique reservation identifier to find the bill from
        paymentMethod - indicates how the guest is paying the bill 1 = cash, 2 = credit card

      • getBillNoFromRoomNo

        public int getBillNoFromRoomNo​(java.lang.String roomNo)
        Gets the bill number from a given room number
        Parameters:
        roomNo - The room number to find the bill from
        Returns:
        the Bill number tagged to the given room

      • saveToFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<Bill> saveToFile​()
        Gives the master list back to main to write to file
        Returns:
        the master bill list
